exception.name: ErrorTooManyRecords
exception.description: This exception is thrown if the amount of requested records exceeds the passed value for the maximum number of records in the context of the export of stored data.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorTooManyRecords that is thrown if the amount of requested records exceeds the passed value for the maximum number of records in the context of the export of stored data.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when query results exceed specified maximum record count
specification.applicability: Data export operations with record limits
